item.title: Oracle AI World 2025: Enterprise AI from Promise to Production
item.description: The AI Inflection Point At Oracle AI World 2025, a clear message emerged: AI isn’t just another technology trendâ€”it’s the bridge between decades of enterprise data and the future of business innovation.1 Unlocking Enterprise Data’s True Potential Oracle founder Larry Ellison framed the opportunity succinctly: “AI offers the highest-value technology we have ever seen so far.”2 The critical insight? Most AI models train on internet data, missing the real competitive advantage: enterprise databases containing mission-critical business information.

item.title: Mauritius Summer Holidays 2025 - Three Weeks of Family, Legacy, and New Beginnings
item.description: I spent three unforgettable weeks in Mauritius during July-August 2025. This trip was special in so many ways - it was about honoring family legacy, building new opportunities, and celebrating the people who matter most. 1. Baptism of Laxmi Villa - A Dream Reborn Estelle and I completed the renovation of Laxmi Villa, the house Dad and Ma built in 1999 after I left Mauritius. The three-floor structure has always held meaning for our family:
